sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
#app.app
  .youtube-app-container
    youtube-configurator(@onSubmit="onSubmit").configurator
    youtube-video().video
    v-switch(v-model="isDebuggerOn"
      label="debugger"
      color="red"
      :class="{activated: isDebuggerOn}").switch-style
    debug-panel(v-if="isDebuggerOn")
</template>

<script>
import YoutubeVideo from './components/YoutubeVideo.vue'
import YoutubeConfigurator from './components/YoutubeController.vue'
import DebugPanel from './components/DebugPanel.vue'
import { videoIdParser } from './utility/parser'
import { validateVideoId } from './utility/validator/youtube-video-validation'
import { YOUTUBE_API_CODES } from './constants/constants'
import { usePlaylistStore } from './store/playlist'
import { VSwitch } from 'vuetify/components'
import { mapState } from 'pinia'
export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    YoutubeVideo,
    YoutubeConfigurator,
    DebugPanel,
    VSwitch
  },
  data() {
    return {
      isDebuggerOn: true
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onSubmit(input) {
      const videoId = videoIdParser(input)
      validateVideoId(videoId).then((status) => {
        if (status === YOUTUBE_API_CODES.VALID) {
          this.onValidIdSubmission(/*  TODO   */)
          this.videoId = videoId
        }
      })
    },
    onValidIdSubmission(videoId) {
      //TODO validateVideoId should return a payload of information including videoId, name, Channel
      // see youtube-video-validation.js
    }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState(usePlaylistStore, ['currentSong']),

    videoId() {
      return this.currentSong.videoId
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
@import 'src/styles/flex';

.youtube-app-container {
  @include flex-column();

  .configurator {
    margin-bottom: 30px;
  }

  .video {
    margin: 15px;
  }
}

.switch-style {
  color: red;
  font-family: copperplate;

  &.activated {
    color: blue;
    font-family: papyrus;
  }
}

.youtube-app-container {
  @include flex-column();
}
</style>
<style lang="scss">
// * {
//   background-image: url('assets/images/pinkStreets.jpg');
//   background-size: cover;
//   // background-repeat: no-repeat, repeat;
//   background-attachment: fixed;
// }
</style>
